attributes.action: Make Katie “Jordan” Price chancellor of the exchequer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: OK, I know she isn't exactly Carol Vorderman, but I think she could do a royal site better than anyone else in that role over the past 10 years. Plus the fact she has a cracking set of children which she loves dearly.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
